author: kkolinko
msg: Test for org.apache.juli.DateFormatCache, copied from trunk.
That test is currently failing, which means that BZ 54044 affects this cache in Tomcat 6.
The fix is ready and will be committed separately.

author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1408450 from branch-1 for HDFS-1539. A config option for the datanode to fsycn a block file when block is completely written.

author: arkurth
msg: Reworked Linux code which configures the sshd and ext_sshd services including the modification of rc.local. Changed flow so sshd configuration is reverted to normal before an image is captured. When the image is loaded, sshd listens on all interfaces. Once sshd responds, the vcld code configures ext_sshd and implements security measures such as locking down sshd so that it only responds to the management node.
Separated out calls to the different init daemon into separate init modules. The ones currently implmented are SysV, systemd, and Upstart. Updated Ubuntu.pm to use the Upstart.pm module.

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-1539. A config option for the datanode to fsycn a block file when block is completely written. Contributed by dhruba
